title: MMAF Equipment Finance LLC 2019-B -- Moody's: North American Equipment Lease and Loan ABS: Percentage of assets with unrated obligors in concentrated and mixed pools - Yahoo Finance
content: MMAF Equipment Finance LLC 2019-B -- Moody's: North American Equipment Lease and Loan ABS: Percentage of assets with unrated obligors in concentrated and mixed pools  Yahoo Finance
description: Announcement: Moody's: North American Equipment Lease and Loan ABS: Percentage of assets with unrated obligors in concentrated and mixed poolsGlobal Credit Research - 31 Jan 2022New York, January 31, 2022 -- Moody's Investors Service ("Moody's") reviews the available information on the collateral backing North American equipment lease and loan ABS transactions that have concentrated or mixed pools (granular pools with a few disproportionately large obligors) to monitor the percentage of assets with unrated obligors in connection with its ratings of such transactions.  All rights reserved.CREDIT RATINGS ISSUED BY MOODY'S CREDIT RATINGS AFFILIATES ARE THEIR CURRENT OPINIONS OF THE RELATIVE FUTURE CREDIT RISK OF ENTITIES, CREDIT COMMITMENTS, OR DEBT OR DEBT-LIKE SECURITIES, AND MATERIALS, PRODUCTS, SERVICES AND INFORMATION PUBLISHED BY MOODY’S (COLLECTIVELY, “PUBLICATIONS”) MAY INCLUDE SUCH CURRENT OPINIONS.
